headline: Citigroup (C) Upgraded to Buy: Here's Why
summary: Citigroup (C) has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy), reflecting growing optimism about the company's earnings prospects. This might drive the stock higher in the near term.

headline: Is It Worth Investing in Citigroup (C) Based on Wall Street's Bullish Views?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Citigroup (C) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?
